reviews.review: So I've actually played this game way more than 3 hours like it may say because it was hella fun back when I had an xbox360. It's even better on PC, runs smoother. The game itself is very intriguing and suspenseful, much unlike its predecessor, Portal (1). But definitely play the first one before you play the second one. It's not as in depth but does give a little background as well as help you use logic to complete levels even better on the second game. 10/10 chicken nuggets would play again (and will).
one of the best games ever made. EVER
Fun puzzles, entertaining story. It's a must play.

Portal 2 is one of the best games ever made. It takes everything from Portal 1 and expands upon it in a seamless, interesting, and hilarious way. You are doing yourself a disservice by not already having it in your library. Go! Buy! Download!
i bought this for my friend and i regret it

Buena Continuación, para pasarselo más de dos veces

This is arguably the best game ever made.

With 2000+ hours on record, this game has been far-and-away my best bang-for-the-buck game purchase. With more downloadable maps on Steam than I could EVER get to, plus the fun of creating and sharing my own, this is the one game that is never in danger of deletion to free up disk space.
It's a fun, funny game that I'd recommend to anyone. I liked the pacing, worldbuilding, and how you don't need to play portal 1 to enjoy or understand portal 2. 10/10
I'll say it here once and for all, this truly is the greatest game of all time.

Simplesmente qualidade Valve.
Inicio, meio e fim TOP.

É um jogo bem desafiador e divertido pelos seus puzzles, passei raiva no começo, mas logo me acostumei e o gameplay começou a fluir bem.
а как какать в рот роботу?
Absolutely amazing. It has a more extensive story than Portal 1, and the co-op is incredibly fun.

Easy (not really), fun (not really), stress-free (not really). I highly recommend it.(yes, really.)

Что может не понравиться в очередном шедевре от Валв обычному рядовому геймеру, вроде меня, не стремящемуся находить какие бы то ни было баги? В этой игре практически любой баг - либо фича, либо ведёт к смерти персонажа, так что мне не очень нужно их искать, да и сложно это. Поэтому в том числе, а по большей части из-за сюжета и шикарной предыстории, я ставлю 12/5.
one of the best mind game escape room title to play with your friends

One of the most fun games to play, ever. Witty, complicated with both great game plot design, its charismatics character really make you wish the game could go on forever...luckily the community chambers are as fun and well-made as the game!

Hra velmi zábavná a super hlavně v co-op, ale pokud váš kamarád je úplný l*o*b*o*t*o*m tak si hru moc neužijete a většinu času na něj budete jenom nadávat. příběh je taky super už tam nebude nikdo kdo by vám to kazil. Doporučuji hrát jenom s přáteli.
Fue mi juego favorito de 2011-2013. hoy que lo juego de nuevo, veo que ha envejecido muy bien. para los que no lo conozcan y gusten de los desafíos se los recomiendo enormemente.

Portal 2 is a sequel to the classic, Portal. This game takes storytelling to a new level with story rich content without long cut scenes. This has to be one of my favourite games due to the rich story and fun game play. The controls are easy to understand, and it's a great time. There is also the Co-op and level editors. Co-op is fun and requires team work to complete and the level editor is simple and people have created challenging yet fun test chambers on it just with the in-game editors.

PROS:
-Amazing Story
-Challenging puzzles
-A bit of comedy in there
-A lot of post game content
-Amazing Price

CONS:
...

Honestly there are no cons that I can think of; this is my second favourite video game of all time. This is a must play for anyone at any gaming level. Whether you're a casual gamer or hardcore this is a must.
